attributes.action: save your economy by keeping people in work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: with it being practically impossible for low income people to get on the property ladder and survive why is it finacially better to be unemployed paying nothing back into the economy than working and paying your taxes.sighn my petition if you are a suffering working person remeber this is a labour goverment and is suppose to look after the working class.

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.

Please specify how you would like the Government to save the economy by keeping people in work.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
